UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: We are not on Nar Shaddaa!!! Please travel there and start this Profile!

UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: You need to have the quest 'The Republic's Finest - Rendezvous with Jonas Balkar'

UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: You need to have the quest 'Nar Shaddaa Landing - Meet Drooga on the Promenade'

Lore: Slave Trading on Nar Shaddaa
Going to take Elevator for Captive

UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: I'm Done on Nar Shaddaa! If you are not on your ship right now, get on it and complete 'Beast Mastery'. Next Step is to travel to Celestial Crow (Distant Outer Rim - The Celestial Crow) for the quest 'Distressed', restart the bot and load up that quest profile on the Celestial Crow! You also got a quest named 'Survival of a Species', that you will to complete by hand!

UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: I'm Done on Nar Shaddaa! If you are not on your ship right now, get on it and complete 'Showdown with Lord Sadic'. Next Step is to travel to the Abandoned Mining Facility (Unknown Regions - Abandoned Mining Facility) for the quest 'The Defector', restart the bot and load up that quest profile on the Abandoned Mining Facility!

MoveTo.Name: Going to report the Republic Embassy

UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: I'm Done on Nar Shaddaa! If you are not on your ship right now, get on it and complete 'Overloaded'. Next Step is to travel to Tavus's Ship (Distant Outer Rim - Tavus's Ship) for the quest 'The Shadow Fist', restart the bot and load up that quest profile on Tavus's Ship!
